zero, one = 0, 0

def quad_block(x, y, size, arr):
    global zero, one
        
    # í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ë¸”ë¡ì¸ì§€ íƒìƒ‰
    for t_x in range(x, x + size):
        for t_y in range(y, y + size):
            if arr[x][y] != arr[t_x][t_y]:
                loc = [(x, y), (x, y+size//2), (x+size//2, y), (x+size//2, y+size//2)]
        
                for i in range(4):
                    quad_block(loc[i][0], loc[i][1], size//2, arr)
                return
    
    if arr[x][y] == 1:
        one += 1
    else:
        zero += 1
    return
            
        
def solution(arr):
    global zero, one
    
    quad_block(0,0,len(arr),arr)
    
    return [zero, one]

def solution(arr):
    zero, one = 0, 0
    stack = [(0, 0, len(arr))]
    
    while stack:
        x, y, size = stack.pop()
        is_block = True
        
        # í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ë¸”ë¡ì¸ì§€ íƒìƒ‰
        for t_x in range(x, x + size):
            for t_y in range(y, y + size):
                if arr[x][y] != arr[t_x][t_y]:
                    is_block = False
                    break
            if not is_block: break
        
        # 4ë¶„í• 
        if not is_block:
            loc = [(x, y), (x, y+size//2), (x+size//2, y), (x+size//2, y+size//2)]

            for i in range(4):
                stack.append((loc[i][0], loc[i][1], size//2))
        else:
            if arr[x][y] == 1:
                one += 1
            else:
                zero += 1
    
    return [zero, one]

    • ì¦‰, íŠ¸ë¦¬ êµ¬ì¡°ì—ì„œ ë‹¨ë§ ë…¸ë“œë¶€í„° ë£¨íŠ¸ ë…¸ë“œê¹Œì§€ ì˜¬ë¼ê°€ë©° ê°€ì¤‘ì¹˜ë¥¼ ë°”ê¿”ê°„ë‹¤. í›„ìœ„ ìˆœíšŒ(post-order)ì™€ ê°™ë‹¤.
    • ì–´ë–¤ ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ rootë¡œ ì„¤ì •í•´ë„ íŠ¸ë¦¬ êµ¬ì¡°ê°€ ìœ ì§€ëœë‹¤.

import sys
sys.setrecursionlimit(300000)

answer = 0

def dfs(node, a, tree, visited):
    global answer
    visited[node] = 1
    
    for leaf in tree[node]:
        if visited[leaf]: continue
        a[node] += dfs(leaf, a, tree, visited)
    answer += abs(a[node])
        
    return a[node]
    

def solution(a, edges):
    if sum(a) != 0: return -1

    global answer
    tree = [set() for _ in range(len(a))]
    visited = [0 for _ in range(len(a))]
    
    for u, v in edges:
        tree[u].add(v)
        tree[v].add(u)
        
    dfs(0, a, tree, visited)
    
    return answer
  1. ë°˜ë³µë¬¸
def solution(a, edges):
    answer, root = 0, 0
    stack = [root]
    tree = [set() for _ in range(len(a))]
    visited = [False for _ in range(len(a))]
    
    if sum(a) != 0: return -1

    # íŠ¸ë¦¬ êµ¬ì¡°
    for u, v in edges:
        tree[u].add(v)
        tree[v].add(u)

    while stack:
        node = stack.pop()

        if visited[node] and len(tree[node]) == 1:
            p_node = tree[node].pop()
            tree[p_node].discard(node)      # ì—°ê²° ê°„ì„  ì‚­ì œ
            a[p_node] += a[node]
            answer += abs(a[node])
            a[node] = 0
        else:
            visited[node] = True
            if node != root:                
                stack.append(node)
            for l_node in tree[node]:
                if not visited[l_node]:
                    stack.append(l_node)
    return answer

íšŒê³

ë¬¸ì œ ì†Œê°œ

nê°œì˜ ë…¸ë“œê°€ ìˆëŠ” ê·¸ë˜í”„ê°€ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê° ë…¸ë“œëŠ” 1ë¶€í„° nê¹Œì§€ ë²ˆí˜¸ê°€ ì í˜€ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. 1ë²ˆ ë…¸ë“œì—ì„œ ê°€ì¥ ë©€ë¦¬ ë–¨ì–´ì§„ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°¯ìˆ˜ë¥¼ êµ¬í•˜ë ¤ê³  í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê°€ì¥ ë©€ë¦¬ ë–¨ì–´ì§„ ë…¸ë“œë€ ìµœë‹¨ê²½ë¡œë¡œ ì´ë™í–ˆì„ ë•Œ ê°„ì„ ì˜ ê°œìˆ˜ê°€ ê°€ì¥ ë§ì€ ë…¸ë“œë“¤ì„ ì˜ë¯¸í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê°œìˆ˜ n, ê°„ì„ ì— ëŒ€í•œ ì •ë³´ê°€ ë‹´ê¸´ 2ì°¨ì› ë°°ì—´ vertexê°€ ë§¤ê°œë³€ìˆ˜ë¡œ ì£¼ì–´ì§ˆ ë•Œ, 1ë²ˆ ë…¸ë“œë¡œë¶€í„° ê°€ì¥ ë©€ë¦¬ ë–¨ì–´ì§„ ë…¸ë“œê°€ ëª‡ ê°œì¸ì§€ë¥¼ return í•˜ë„ë¡ solution í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.

ì‹œë‚˜ë¦¬ì˜¤

  1. ì…ë ¥ ë°›ì€ ì–‘ë°©í–¥ ë…¸ë“œë¥¼ ë³´ê¸° ì‰½ê²Œ ì •ë¦¬í•œë‹¤.
  2. ì‹œì‘ ì§€ì ì— ì—°ê²°ëœ ë…¸ë“œë“¤ì„ íì— ë„£ê³  ì²˜ë¦¬í•œë‹¤.

  3. íì—ì„œ í•˜ë‚˜ì”© êº¼ë‚´ ì—°ê²°ëœ ë…¸ë“œë“¤ì„ ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ì´ ì²˜ë¦¬

    • ì´ë¯¸ ë°©ë¬¸í•˜ì§€ ì•Šì€ ë…¸ë“œì˜ ê²½ìš° ë°©ë¬¸ í‘œì‹œì™€ í•¨ê»˜ í˜„ì¬ê¹Œì§€ì˜ ê°„ì„  ê°¯ìˆ˜ + 1ì„ ì €ì¥
    • ì´ë¯¸ ë°©ë¬¸í•œ ë…¸ë“œì¼ ê²½ìš° íì— ì‚½ì… X

ê·¸ë˜í”„ë¥¼ íƒìƒ‰í•  ë•Œ DFSê°€ ì•„ë‹Œ BFSë¡œ íƒìƒ‰í•˜ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ì œì¼ ë°©ë¬¸ í‘œì‹œë¥¼ í•  ë•Œ ì €ì¥í•˜ëŠ” ê°„ì„  ê°¯ìˆ˜ê°€ ìµœì†Œ ë¹„ìš©ì´ë‹¤.

ë§Œì•½ DFSë¡œ íƒìƒ‰ í–ˆë‹¤ë©´ ì´ë¯¸ ë°©ë¬¸í•œ ë…¸ë“œì¼ì§€ë¼ë„ í˜„ì¬ê¹Œì§€ì˜ ë¹„ìš©ì´ ìµœì†Œ ë¹„ìš©ì¸ì§€ ë¹„êµí•´ì•¼ í•œë‹¤.

ë¬¸ì œ í’€ì´

  1. ë”•ì…”ë„ˆë¦¬ë¥¼ í™œìš©
from collections import deque

def solution(n, edge):
    start = 1
    graph, visited = dict() ,{1:0}
    queue = deque()

    # ê·¸ë˜í”„í™”
    for x, y in edge:
        if x in graph:
            graph[x].add(y)
        else:
            graph[x] = set([y])
        if y in graph:
            graph[y].add(x)
        else:
            graph[y] = set([x])
    
    # ì‹œì‘ ì§€ì ê³¼ ì—°ê²°ëœ ë…¸ë“œ ì²˜ë¦¬
    for node in graph[1]:
        queue.appendleft((node, 1))
        visited[node] = 1
        
    # íƒìƒ‰
    while queue:
        now, cost = queue.pop()
        for next_node in graph[now]:
            if next_node not in visited:
                visited[next_node] = cost + 1
                queue.appendleft((next_node, cost + 1))
            else:
                if visited[next_node] > cost + 1:
                    visited[next_node] = cost + 1

    return list(visited.values()).count(max(visited.values()))

ë”•ì…”ë„ˆë¦¬ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í–ˆì„ ë•Œ ì§ê´€ì„±ì´ ì¢‹ì•„ í’€ì´ê°€ ìˆ˜ì›”í•œ ê°ì´ ìˆì—ˆë‹¤. í•˜ì§€ë§Œ ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸ë³´ë‹¤ ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ë¥¼ ë§ì´ ì†Œëª¨í•œë‹¤ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ì•Œê³  ìˆì—ˆê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— ê³µê°„ ë³µì¡ë„ë¥¼ ì¤„ì´ê³ ì í•œë‹¤.

ë˜í•œ íì— ì‚½ì…í•  ë•Œ êµ³ì´ ë¹„ìš©ì„ ê°™ì´ ë„£ì„ í•„ìš”ê°€ ì—†ë‹¤ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ê¹¨ë‹¬ì•˜ë‹¤. ì´ì „ì˜ ë…¸ë“œì—ì„œ +1ë§Œ í•´ì£¼ë©´ í˜„ì¬ ê°„ì„ ê¹Œì§€ì˜ ë¹„ìš©ì´ ë˜ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— íì— ë„£ì„ ë•Œ ë¹„ìš©ì²˜ë¦¬ì™€ ë°©ë¬¸ì²˜ë¦¬ë¥¼ í•´ì£¼ê³ , íì—ëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒ ë…¸ë“œë§Œ ë„£ì–´ë³´ë ¤ í•œë‹¤.

  1. ì²« ë²ˆì§¸ í’€ì´
from collections import deque

def solution(n, edge):
    start = 1
    graph = [set() for _ in range(n+1)]
    costs = [0 for _ in range(n+1)]
    visited = [False for _ in range(n+1)]
    queue = deque()
    
    # ê·¸ë˜í”„í™”
    for x, y in edge:
        graph[x].add(y)
        graph[y].add(x)
        
    # ì‹œì‘ ì§€ì ê³¼ ì—°ê²°ëœ ë…¸ë“œ ì²˜ë¦¬
    visited[start] = True
    for node in graph[start]:
        queue.appendleft(node)
        costs[node] = 1
        visited[node] = True
        
    # íƒìƒ‰
    while queue:
        now = queue.pop()
        
        for next_node in graph[now]:
            if not visited[next_node]:
                queue.appendleft(next_node)
                visited[next_node] = True
                costs[next_node] = costs[now] + 1
    
    return costs.count(max(costs))

ë¬¸ì œ í’€ì´

def solution(n, results):
    answer = 0
    wins = [set() for _ in range(n+1)]
    loses = [set() for _ in range(n+1)]
    
    for A, B in results:
        wins[A].add(B)
        loses[B].add(A)

    for i in range(1,n+1):
        for loser in wins[i]:
            loses[loser] |= loses[i]
        for winner in loses[i]:
            wins[winner] |= wins[i]
            
    for w in range(1,len(wins)):
        if len(wins[w]) + len(loses[w]) == n - 1:
            answer += 1

    return answer

def solution(routes):
    answer = 0
    routes.sort(key=lambda x:x[1])
    cameras = set()

    while routes:
        start, end = routes.pop(0)
        checking = False
        for camera in cameras:
            if start <= camera <= end:
                checking = True
                break
        if not checking:
            cameras.add(end)
            answer += 1
            
    return answer

def solution(routes):
    routes = sorted(routes, key=lambda x: x[1])
    last_camera = -30000

    answer = 0

    for route in routes:
        if last_camera < route[0]:
            answer += 1
            last_camera = route[1]

    return answer

def dec_to_bin(n):
    if n == 0:
        return '0'
    bin = ''
    while n // 2 > 0:
        bin = str(n % 2) + bin
        n = n // 2
        
    return "1" + bin

    for s in reversed(bin):
        if s == '1':
            dec += digit
        digit *= 2
    
    return dec
     
def solution(numbers):
    answer = []

    for number in numbers:
        bin = "0" + dec_to_bin(number)

        if bin == '00':
            answer.append(1)
            continue
        
        if bin[-1] == '0':
            answer.append(bin_to_dec(bin[:len(bin)-1]+'1'))
            continue

        new_bin = ''
        for s in reversed(range(1, len(bin))):
            if bin[s-1:s+1] == "01":
                new_bin = bin[:s-1] + "10" + bin[s+1:]
                break
        
        answer.append(bin_to_dec(new_bin))
                          
    return answer

def dec_to_bin(n):
    bin = ''
    
    while n // 2 > 0:
        bin = str(n % 2) + bin
        n = n // 2
    bin = '1' + bin
    return bin

def solution(s):
    answer = [0, 0]
   
    while s != "1":
        zero_c = s.count('0')
        dec_n = len(s) - zero_c
        s = dec_to_bin(dec_n)
        
        answer[0] += 1
        answer[1] += zero_c
    
    return answer

from itertools import combinations

def solution(number, k):
    answer = ''
    cb = set()

    for c in combinations(number, len(number)-k):
        cb.add(c)
    
    li = list(cb)
    li.sort(reverse=True)
    

    for s in li[0]:
        answer += s

    return answer

ë¬¸ì œ í’€ì´

def solution(number, k):
    answer = ''
    stack = list()
    
    for n in number:
        if not stack:
            stack.append(n)
            continue
        while stack and stack[-1] < n and k != 0:
            stack.pop()
            k -= 1
        stack.append(n)
    
    while k:
        stack.pop()
        k -= 1
    
    while stack:
        answer = stack.pop() + answer
        
    return answer

def solution(numbers, target):
    answer = 0
    stack = [[0,0]]

    while(stack):
        base, n = stack.pop()
    
        if n == len(numbers):
            if target == base: 
                answer += 1
            continue
        
        stack.append([base+numbers[n], n+1])
        stack.append([base-numbers[n], n+1])
    
    return answer

  1. ë¨¼ì €, beginì˜ ë‹¨ì–´ê°€ wordsì˜ ë‹¨ì–´ë¡œ êµì²´ ê°€ëŠ¥í•œ ê²½ìš° íì— í˜„ì¬ê¹Œì§€ì˜ íšŸìˆ˜ì™€ í•¨ê»˜ push

from collections import deque

def solution(begin, target, words):
    changed = [0 for _ in range(len(words))]
    que = deque()
    que.appendleft([begin, 0])

    while(que):
        begin, count = que.pop()
        
        if begin == target: 
            return count
        
        for w in range(len(words)):
            if not changed[w] and tf(begin, words[w]):
                changed[w] = 1
                que.appendleft([words[w], count+1])
                
    return 0

# ë³€í™˜ ê°€ëŠ¥ ì—¬ë¶€ í™•ì¸
def tf(b, t):
    same = 0
    for i in range(len(b)):
        if b[i] == t[i]:
            same += 1
    if same == len(b)-1:
        return True
    return False

# ë³€í™˜ ë¡œì§
def transform(p):
    if not p: return p
    u, v = dividing(p)
    
    if correcting(u):         
        return u + transform(v)
    
    s = "(" + transform(v) + ")"
    for i in u[1:len(u)-1]:
        if i == "(": s += ")"
        else: s += "("
         
    return s

# ê· í˜• ì¡íŒ ë‘ ê°œì˜ ê´„í˜¸ ë¬¸ìì—´ë¡œ ë¶„í• 
def dividing(s):
    left, right = 0, 0
    for i in range(len(s)):
        if s[i] == '(': left += 1
        else: right += 1
        if left == right:
            return s[:i+1], s[i+1:]

# ì˜¬ë°”ë¥¸ ê´„í˜¸ ë¬¸ìì—´ì¸ì§€ íŒë‹¨.
def correcting(s):
    stack = [s[0]]
    
    for i in s[1:]:
        if not stack or i == "(": stack.append(i)
        elif stack[-1] == ")": stack.append(i)
        else: stack.pop()
            
    if not stack: return True
    else: return False
    

def solution(p):
    return transform(p)

from collections import deque

def solution(maps):
    queue = deque()
    queue.appendleft([0,0,1])

    return bfs(maps, queue)


def bfs(maps, queue):
    x, y, count = queue.pop()
    maps[x][y] = 0

    if x == len(maps)-1 and y == len(maps[0])-1:
        return count

    if x - 1 >= 0 and maps[x-1][y] == 1:
        queue.appendleft([x-1,y,count+1])
    if x + 1 <= len(maps)-1 and maps[x+1][y] == 1:
        queue.appendleft([x+1,y,count+1])
    if y - 1 >= 0 and maps[x][y-1] == 1:
        queue.appendleft([x,y-1,count+1])
    if y + 1 <= len(maps[0])-1 and maps[x][y+1] == 1:
        queue.appendleft([x,y+1,count+1])

    if len(queue) == 0:
        return -1

    return bfs(maps, queue)

ì›ì¸ì„ ì œëŒ€ë¡œ íŒŒì•…í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆì–´ì„œ ì•ˆë„í•˜ë©° ë°˜ë³µë¬¸ìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€ê²½í–ˆë‹¤ğŸ‘

from collections import deque

def solution(maps):
    queue = deque()
    queue.appendleft([0,0,1])
    result = -1
    x_size, y_size = len(maps), len(maps[0])
    
    while(len(queue) != 0):
        x, y, count = queue.pop()

        if x == x_size-1 and y == y_size-1:
            result = count
        
        if x - 1 >= 0 and maps[x-1][y] == 1:
            queue.appendleft([x-1,y,count+1])
            maps[x-1][y] = 0
        if x + 1 <= x_size-1 and maps[x+1][y] == 1:
            queue.appendleft([x+1,y,count+1])
            maps[x+1][y] = 0
        if y - 1 >= 0 and maps[x][y-1] == 1:
            queue.appendleft([x,y-1,count+1])
            maps[x][y-1] = 0
        if y + 1 <= y_size-1 and maps[x][y+1] == 1:
            queue.appendleft([x,y+1,count+1])
            maps[x][y+1] = 0
    
    return result

def make_one(n):
    min_count = 1000000
    if n == 1:
        return 0
    if n % 3 == 0:
        tmp = make_one(n // 3)
        if tmp < min_count:
            min_count = tmp
    if n % 2 == 0:
        tmp = make_one(n // 2)
        if tmp < min_count:
            min_count = tmp
    tmp = make_one(n - 1)
    if tmp < min_count:
        min_count = tmp
    return min_count + 1


quest = int(input())
print(make_one(quest))

def dynamic(n):
    storage = [0, 0, 1, 1]
    for up in range(4, n+1):
        check = 10000
        if up % 3 == 0:
            tmp = storage[up // 3]
            if tmp < check:
                check = tmp
        if up % 2 == 0:
            tmp = storage[up // 2]
            if tmp < check:
                check = tmp
        tmp = storage[up - 1]
        if tmp < check:
            check = tmp
        storage.append(check +1)
    return storage[n]

n = int(input())
